name: Dark Matter Laboratories B.V.
goal: Strategic advice and product development / innovation in the field of institutional infrastructures for public benefit. we design institutional infrastructure for a distributed and collaborative future. We work with partners, clients, and collaborators across the world (international organisations; mission driven foundations; government agencies and city governments; and private sector clients), researching and developing new support frameworks for collaborative system change. Our work includes organisational strategy, innovation programmes, new institutional infrastructures for funding (and accounting for) investments in systemic change, regulatory infrastructure, and local governance experiments. Our role is that of strategic consultant as well as co-designing and co-delivering such new institutional infrastructure.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: EIT Climate-KIC; Horizon 2020; European Climate Change Programme; Urban Agenda.
